item.title: My New Post
item.description: #R code chunk library(reticulate) #Python code chunk #Popular starches and their calories per cup import re starch_calories={'brownrice':216, 'whiterice':206, 'potato':163, 'corn':177, 'oatmeal':158, 'whitebread':109 } starch_calories ## {'whiterice': 206, 'brownrice': 216, 'whitebread': 109, 'potato': 163, 'corn': 177, 'oatmeal': 158} x=2 #R code chunk library(reticulate) py$starch_calories['brownrice'] ## $brownrice ## [1] 216 calo<-py$starch_calories total<-calo$brownrice + calo$whiterice + calo$potato + calo$corn + calo$oatmeal + calo$whitebread total ## [1] 1029 py$x ## [1] 2
